message.name: ERR_THIRD_PARTY_REQUEST_THIRD_PARTY_NOT_SELECTED
message.locale: A third party must be selected or entered before a request can be saved.

message.name: ERR_THIRD_PARTY_REQUEST_ONLY_ONE_THIRD_PARTY_SHOULD_BE_SELECTED
message.locale: Only one Third Party can be entered. Please select a Third Party Participant, or search for a registered Third Party, or enter details for an unregistered Third Party.

message.name: ERR_THIRD_PARTY_REQUEST_UNSENT_THIRD_PARTY_REQUEST_ALREADY_EXIST
message.locale: A third party request that has not yet been sent already exists for this Third Party. The unsent request should be sent or canceled before a new request to this person can be created.
A third party request that has not yet been sent already exists for this Third Party. The unsent request should be sent or cancelled before a new request to this person can be created.

message.name: ERR_THIRD_PARTY_REQUEST_THIRD_PARTY_TYPE_IS_EMPTY
message.locale: Third Party Type needs to be selected.

message.name: ERR_THIRD_PARTY_REQUEST_NO_QUESTION_SELECTED
message.locale: Questions must be selected before the request can be saved.

message.name: ERR_THIRD_PARTY_REQUEST_QUESTION_NOT_ADDED
message.locale: Questions have not been added to the request. Please add questions before sending the request.

message.name: ERR_THIRD_PARTY_REQUEST_CANCEL_SENT
message.locale: This third party request has been sent and cannot be canceled.
This third party request has been sent and cannot be cancelled.

message.name: ERR_THIRD_PARTY_REQUEST_CANCEL_ANSWER_RECD
message.locale: Answers have been received for this third party request and it cannot be canceled.
Answers have been received for this third party request and it cannot be cancelled.

message.name: ERR_THIRD_PARTY_ANSWER_NO_ANSWERS_RECORDED
message.locale: No answers have been recorded for this third party request, answers must be entered before you can save.

message.name: ERR_THIRD_PARTY_ANSWER_DATE_BFR_REQUEST
message.locale: The Date Received entered is before the date the third party answers were requested. Please check the date and re-enter.

message.name: ERR_THIRD_PARTY_ANSWER_DATE_FUTURE
message.locale: The Date Received entered is a date in the future. Please check the date and re-enter.

message.name: ERR_THIRD_PARTY_ANSWER_NO_ANSWERS_UPDATED
message.locale: No answers have been updated for this third party request, answers must be updated before you can save.

message.name: ERR_THIRD_PARTY_REQUEST_NO_ALIAS_QUESTIONS
message.locale: There are no question aliases for this Third Party Type.

message.name: ERR_THIRD_PARTY_REQUEST_CLAIMANT_CANNOT_BE_SELECTED_AS_THIRD_PARTY
message.locale: Claimant cannot be selected as a Third Party.
